name: Anagram Master
description:
Anagram Master

Words or phrases from different categories have been mixed up or turned into Anagrams.

Use your word skills to rearrange the letters and find their true form!

Featuring:

  • 216 different anagrams or mix ups to solve!
  • 6 different categories of anagram puzzles to play and unlock
  • 3 different difficulties; Easy, Normal and Hard
  • Loads of colour themes or variations to suit your mood
  • Hints to help you when you get stuck
  • Get the Masterer Pack for another 9 categories and 324 puzzles!

Can you become the Anagram Master?!

How to Play

Puzzles are words or phrases turned into an anagram or mixed up. The goal of the game is to rearrange the letter tiles back into the word or phrase. Press a letter tile to select it. Press another letter tile to swap them. Swap letters until you have spelled out the correct word or phrase to win. Watch out for extra spaces that might throw you off!
